Title: The Gun
Writer: Marta Kauffman (created by), Howard J. Morris (created by), Julie Durk, David Budin (executive story editor), Brendan McCarthy (executive story editor), Julie Durk
Actors: Jane Fonda, Lily Tomlin, Sam Waterston, Martin Sheen
Plot: Furious about Grace's revelation, Frankie refuses to make up with her. In the wake of his fight with Sol, Robert decides to come out to his mother.
